name: CVE-2010-1021
description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Typo3 Quixplorer (t3quixplorer) extension before 1.7.1 for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:mads_brunn:t3quixplorer:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:mads_brunn:t3quixplorer:1.0.0:-:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:mads_brunn:t3quixplorer:1.4.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:mads_brunn:t3quixplorer:1.5.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:mads_brunn:t3quixplorer:1.6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:mads_brunn:t3quixplorer:1.3.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:mads_brunn:t3quixplorer:1.2.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:mads_brunn:t3quixplorer:1.0.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:mads_brunn:t3quixplorer:1.0.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:typo3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
